i18n.key: website main URL, including the protocol (″http://″) but without the end ″/″.
drop a Skin here in order to apply it to the element
select a sylesheet in order to apply it to the element
If set to no, the localized website needs to have a different domain than its original version, otherwise it will have an url like http://www.rbs.fr/fr/.
Domain name of the website (eg: www.rbs.fr)
append website name to page title
select ″yes″ to always append the website name to page title (recommanded by accessiblity rules)
ID in the Google identification file name (/google<ID>.html)
content of the Google identification file (/google<ID>.html)
ID in the Yahoo identification file name (/y_key_<ID>.html)
content of the Yahoo identification file (/y_key_<ID>.html)
XML content of the Bing identification file (/BingSiteAuth.xml)
